author: Buddha
message: There are only two mistakes one can make along the road to truth; not going all the way, and not starting.
title: Thought of the day

author: Marcus Aurelius
message: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
title: Thought of the day

message: Giving up doesn't always mean you are weak. Sometimes it means that you are strong enough to let go.
title: Thought of the day

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
message: Treat people as if they were what they ought to be and you help them to become what they are capable of being.
title: Thought of the day
